repairedDockerfile:
# blur-admin base image 
FROM node:6.2.2 
MAINTAINER Darren Everley <darren.everley@sysemia.co.uk> 

RUN npm install --global gulp-cli && \
npm install --global bower && npm cache clean --force;

RUN mkdir -p /usr/src/app && rm -rf /usr/src/app
WORKDIR /usr/src/app 

COPY package.json /usr/src/app/ 
COPY bower.json /usr/src/app/ 
RUN npm install && \
bower install -F --allow-root --config.interactive=false && npm cache clean --force;
COPY . /usr/src/app 

ENV GULP_COMMAND serve:dist 

ENTRYPOINT ["sh", "-c"] 
CMD ["gulp $GULP_COMMAND"]
